concept: Value added per employee, cultural sector (CLT, thousand euro)
transformation: Computed as (AV_MEUR * 1000) / EMP_NR using CLT aggregate (nace_r2=CLT)

concept: Value added per employee, music sector minimum (thousand euro)
transformation: Computed as (sum AV_MEUR * 1000) / (sum EMP_NR) over NACE codes; size_emp=TOTAL

concept: Value added per employee, music sector maximum (thousand euro)
transformation: Computed as (sum AV_MEUR * 1000) / (sum EMP_NR) over NACE codes; size_emp=TOTAL
